verses.verse: After <S%H310><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to Abram <S%H87><s%> in a vision, <S%H4236><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Do not fear, <S%H3372><s%> Abram, <S%H87><s%> I am a shield <S%H4043><s%> to you; Your reward <S%H7939><s%> shall be very <S%H3966><s%> great. <S%H7235><s%>"

And Abram <S%H87><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "O Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> wilt Thou give <S%H5414><s%> me, since I am <S%H1980><s%> childless, <S%H6185><s%> and the heir <S%H1121><s%> <S%H4943><s%> of my house <S%H1004><s%> is Eliezer <S%H461><s%> of Damascus <S%H1834><s%>?"

And Abram <S%H87><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Since <S%H2005><s%> Thou hast given <S%H5414><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> offspring <S%H2233><s%> to me, one <S%H1121><s%> born <S%H1121><s%> in my house <S%H1004><s%> is my heir. <S%H3423><s%>"

Then behold, <S%H2009><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came to him, saying, <S%H559><s%> "This <S%H2088><s%> man will not be your heir; <S%H3423><s%> but one who <S%H834><s%> shall come <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> from your own body, <S%H4578><s%> he shall be your heir. <S%H3423><s%>"

And He took <S%H3318><s%> him outside <S%H2351><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Now <S%H4994><s%> look <S%H5027><s%> toward the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and count <S%H5608><s%> the stars, <S%H3556><s%> if <S%H518><s%> you are able <S%H3201><s%> to count <S%H5608><s%> them." And He said <S%H559><s%> to him, "So <S%H3541><s%> shall your descendants <S%H2233><s%> be."
Then he believed <S%H539><s%> in the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> and He reckoned <S%H2803><s%> it to him as righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>

And He said <S%H559><s%> to him, "I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> who <S%H834><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> you out of Ur <S%H218><s%> of the Chaldeans, <S%H3778><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> you this <S%H2088><s%> land <S%H776><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it."
And he said, <S%H559><s%> "O Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> how <S%H4100><s%> may I know <S%H3045><s%> that I shall possess <S%H3423><s%> it?"

So He said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Bring <S%H3947><s%> Me a three <S%H8027><s%> year <S%H8027><s%> old <S%H8027><s%> heifer, <S%H5697><s%> and a three <S%H8027><s%> year <S%H8027><s%> old <S%H8027><s%> female <S%H5795><s%> goat, <S%H5795><s%> and a three <S%H8027><s%> year <S%H8027><s%> old <S%H8027><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%> and a turtledove, <S%H8449><s%> and a young <S%H1469><s%> pigeon. <S%H1469><s%>"

Then he brought <S%H3947><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> to Him and cut <S%H1334><s%> them in two, <S%H8432><s%> and laid <S%H5414><s%> each <S%H376><s%> half <S%H1335><s%> opposite <S%H7122><s%> the other; <S%H7453><s%> but he did not cut <S%H1334><s%> the birds. <S%H6833><s%>
And the birds <S%H5861><s%> of prey <S%H5861><s%> came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> upon the carcasses, <S%H6297><s%> and Abram <S%H87><s%> drove <S%H5380><s%> them away. <S%H5380><s%>

Now when the sun <S%H8121><s%> was going <S%H935><s%> down, a deep <S%H8639><s%> sleep <S%H8639><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> upon Abram; <S%H87><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> terror <S%H367><s%> [and] great <S%H1419><s%> darkness <S%H2825><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> upon him.

And [God] said <S%H559><s%> to Abram, <S%H87><s%> "Know <S%H3045><s%> for certain <S%H3045><s%> that your descendants <S%H2233><s%> will be strangers <S%H1616><s%> in a land <S%H776><s%> that is not theirs, <S%H1992><s%> where they will be enslaved <S%H5647><s%> and oppressed <S%H6031><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

"But I will also <S%H1571><s%> judge <S%H1777><s%> the nation <S%H1471><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> they will serve; <S%H5647><s%> and afterward <S%H310><s%> <S%H3651><s%> they will come <S%H3318><s%> out with many <S%H1419><s%> possessions. <S%H7399><s%>
"And as for you, you shall go <S%H935><s%> to your fathers in peace; <S%H1><s%> you shall be buried <S%H7965><s%> at a good <S%H6912><s%> old <S%H2896><s%> age. <S%H7872><s%>

"Then in the fourth <S%H7243><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%> they shall return <S%H7725><s%> here, <S%H2008><s%> for the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the Amorite <S%H567><s%> is not yet <S%H5704><s%> <S%H2008><s%> complete. <S%H8003><s%>"

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about when the sun <S%H8121><s%> had set, <S%H935><s%> that it was very <S%H5939><s%> dark, <S%H5939><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> [there appeared] a smoking <S%H6227><s%> oven <S%H8574><s%> and a flaming <S%H784><s%> torch <S%H3940><s%> which <S%H834><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> between <S%H996><s%> these <S%H428><s%> pieces. <S%H1506><s%>

On that day <S%H3117><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with Abram, <S%H87><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "To your descendants <S%H2233><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> From the river <S%H5104><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as the great <S%H1419><s%> river, <S%H5104><s%> the river <S%H5104><s%> Euphrates: <S%H6578><s%>
the Kenite <S%H7017><s%> and the Kenizzite <S%H7074><s%> and the Kadmonite <S%H6935><s%>
and the Hittite <S%H2850><s%> and the Perizzite <S%H6522><s%> and the Rephaim <S%H7497><s%>
and the Amorite <S%H567><s%> and the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> and the Girgashite <S%H1622><s%> and the Jebusite. <S%H2983><s%> "
